summary:
A small mod to make food better and make cooking actually worthwhile.
It makes player-made food better and also adds a perk to be able to make even better food.
descriptionHtml:
This mod makes all the food that can be cooked by the player slightly stronger.
There is also a new perk called \"Master Chef\" in the alchemy perk tree. Taking the perk will make the recipes even stronger, with most food being about 2-3 times stronger than in vanilla Skyrim.

The food that are changed are all food that the player are able to cook:

Apple Cabbage Stew 
Cabbage Potato Soup
Cooked Beef
Elsweyr Fondue 
Grilled Chicken Breast 
Horker Loaf 
Horker Stew 
Horse Haunch 
Leg of Goat Roast 
Mammoth Steak 
Pheasant Roast 
Rabbit Haunch 
Salmon Steak 
Tomato Soup 
Vegetable Soup 
Venison Chop
Venison Stew
author: Fippe94
